statements: SELECT * FROM sustainability_report;
SELECT company_id, social_impact FROM sustainability_report WHERE environmental_impact > 0.5;
SELECT company_id, social_impact, environmental_impact FROM sustainability_report WHERE social_impact < environmental_impact;
SELECT company_id, environmental_impact FROM sustainability_report ORDER BY social_impact ASC;
SELECT * FROM sustainability_report WHERE social_impact >= environmental_impact;
SELECT * FROM sustainability_report WHERE company_id = 123;
SELECT company_id, social_impact FROM sustainability_report WHERE social_impact > 0.5 ORDER BY social_impact DESC;
SELECT AVG(social_impact) AS avg_social_impact, AVG(environmental_impact) AS avg_environmental_impact FROM sustainability_report;
SELECT * FROM sustainability_report ORDER BY environmental_impact ASC, social_impact DESC;
SELECT company_id, social_impact + environmental_impact AS total_impact FROM sustainability_report WHERE social_impact > environmental_impact;
SELECT * FROM company_impact;
SELECT company_id, social_impact_score FROM company_impact WHERE social_impact_score > 80;
SELECT company_id, environmental_impact_score FROM company_impact ORDER BY environmental_impact_score DESC;
SELECT company_id, environmental_impact_score, social_impact_score FROM company_impact WHERE environmental_impact_score < 50 AND social_impact_score > 70;
SELECT * FROM sustainability_reporting WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT company_id, social_impact_score, environmental_impact_score FROM company_impact WHERE social_impact_score > 0.8 ORDER BY social_impact_score DESC, environmental_impact_score ASC
SELECT * FROM sustainability_reporting WHERE report_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT social_impact_score, AVG(environmental_impact_score) AS avg_env_impact FROM company_impact GROUP BY social_impact_score HAVING avg_env_impact > 0.5 ORDER BY avg_env_impact DESC
SELECT c.company_id, c.social_impact_score, r.report_date FROM company_impact c JOIN sustainability_reporting r ON c.company_id = r.company_id ORDER BY r.report_date DESC, c.social_impact_score ASC
SELECT MAX(social_impact_score) AS max_social_impact, MIN(environmental_impact_score) AS min_env_impact FROM company_impact
SELECT * FROM company;
SELECT company_name, company_location FROM company;
SELECT company_id, company_name, company_location FROM company WHERE company_id = 1;
SELECT company_id, company_name, company_location FROM company ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT company_id, company_name, company_location FROM company WHERE company_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM company
SELECT company_name, company_location FROM company ORDER BY company_name ASC
SELECT * FROM social_impact WHERE category = 'Education'
SELECT company_name, impact_description FROM company JOIN social_impact ON company.company_id = social_impact.company_id
SELECT company_name, impact_description FROM company JOIN social_impact ON company.company_id = social_impact.company_id WHERE category = 'Healthcare'
SELECT * FROM SustainabilityMetrics;
SELECT company_name, carbon_footprint FROM SustainabilityMetrics WHERE carbon_footprint > 100;
SELECT company_name, water_consumption FROM SustainabilityMetrics ORDER BY water_consumption DESC;
SELECT company_name, waste_generated FROM SustainabilityMetrics WHERE waste_generated < 50 ORDER BY waste_generated;
SELECT * FROM ReportingPeriod WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM SustainabilityMetrics ORDER BY carbon_footprint DESC, water_consumption ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT company_name, carbon_footprint, water_consumption FROM SustainabilityMetrics WHERE carbon_footprint > 100 AND waste_generated < 50 ORDER BY company_name LIMIT 5;

SELECT company_name, SUM(electricity_consumption + gas_consumption) AS total_energy_consumption FROM EnergyConsumption GROUP BY company_name HAVING total_energy_consumption > 500 ORDER BY total_energy_consumption DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT company_name, employee_diversity, community_engagement FROM SocialImpact WHERE employee_diversity LIKE '%diverse%' AND community_engagement IS NOT NULL ORDER BY company_name LIMIT 5;
SELECT company_name, start_date, end_date FROM ReportingPeriod WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY start_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM company;
SELECT company_name, industry, location FROM company WHERE industry = 'Tech';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM product ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT company_name, revenue FROM company WHERE revenue > 1000000;
SELECT report_date, social_impact, environmental_impact FROM impact_report WHERE company_id = 1;
SELECT company_name, revenue FROM company ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department, hire_date FROM employee WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY hire_date;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM product WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT company_name, location, industry FROM company WHERE industry = 'Tech' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT report_date, social_impact, environmental_impact FROM impact_report WHERE company_id = 1 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
